name: Box Raid
description:
A game I made, I think it's cool

What you can expect

A top-down strategy game about leading your team of soldiers to the win. You have to eliminate the enemy team, with clever maneuvers and sweet weapons. It even has a map editor.

What you can NOT expect

The game is in early access, don't expect high quality graphics or smooth and perfectly balanced gameplay. Also don't use buttons like SHIFT when naming your map, you won't be able to play it afterwards.

How to play?

move through the levels and kill the enemies.

WASD - Movement (You move relative to your mouse cursor)

SPACE - Shoot

R (+ SHIFT) - Reload (with you team)
